text.section: This section applies to all employees in the State Personnel Management System.

section.section:
An employee subject to this section is entitled to extra pay, known as shift differential pay, if the employee:
is employed in a position designated for this purpose; and
works on a shift that starts on or after 2:00 p.m. and on or before 1:00 a.m.
A State-employed fire fighter is entitled to shift differential pay for qualifying hours if the fire fighter works on a shift of at least 8 hours, regardless of the time that the shift starts.
The Secretary shall adopt regulations for the payment of shift differential pay.
